BriefDescription: bytes all masters read from ddr based on read-cycles event imx8mn_ddr.read_cycles * 4 * 2 from x86/freescal/imx8mn
bytes all masters write to ddr based on write-cycles event imx8mn_ddr.write_cycles * 4 * 2 from x86/freescal/imx8mn
bytes of all masters read from ddr imx8_ddr0 at axid ... from x86/freescal/imx8mn
